greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Riordan array (1/(1+x),x(1+x)/(1-x)).
comment: Equivalent to Delannoy triangle A008288 with prepended column 1,-1,1,-1,... Row sums are A111954. Diagonal sums are A112476. Inverse is A112477.
formula: Number triangle T(n,k) = Sum{j=0..n-k} C(k-1,j) C(n-j-1,n-k-j).
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Sep 07 2005
